bug.short_desc: qx.lang.Object.clone does not supports deep cloning

long_desc.thetext:

See the bellow playground sample:
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/devel/playground/#%7B%22code%22%3A%22var%2520original%2520%253D%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520aa%253A%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520aaa%253A%2520'a%2520string'%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bbb%253A%2520'b%2520string'%250A%2520%2520%257D%250A%257D%253B%250A%250Avar%2520clonedObject%2520%253D%2520qx.lang.Object.clone(original)%253B%250AclonedObject.aa.aaa%2520%253D%2520'an11other%2520string'%253B%250A%250Aqx.dev.Debug.debugObject(original)%253B%250A%252F*%250A%257B%250A%2520%2520aa%253A%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520aaa%253A%2520'another%2520string'%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bbb%253A%2520'b%2520string'%250A%2520%2520%257D%250A%257D%250A%250AOutput%2520should%2520be%253A%250A%257B%250A%2520%2520aa%253A%2520%257B%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520aaa%253A%2520'a%2520string'%252C%250A%2520%2520%2520%2520bbb%253A%2520'b%2520string'%250A%2520%2520%257D%250A%257D%250A*%252F%22%2C%20%22mode%22%3A%22ria%22%7D
